title: Sawatari-san wo Kouryakusuru Houhou
original_name: 沢渡さんを攻略する方法
sinopse: Since childhood, Sawatari Sena always together with her best friends, Ichika and Kouta. Sawatari feels satisfied and happy with her small world. But then suddenly appeared Nakatani, a cheerful boy who loves Sawatari. Will Nakatani desperate facing Sawatari's rejection who secretly loves Kouta?
